documentation.value:
## name
**[required] string**

[📖 Documentation](<https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/azurerm/latest/docs/data-sources/resource_group#name>) | [🔍 See Related Issues](<https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-provider-azurerm/issues?q=is:issue datasource#azurerm_resource_group name>) | [🐛 Raise Issue](<https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-provider-azurerm/issues/new?template=Bug_Report.yml&title=`datasource#azurerm_resource_group` - name >)

---



The Name which should be used for this Resource Group. Changing this forces a new Resource Group to be created.
